info.title: OANDA v20 Positions API
info.description: v20 Position-related definitions and endpoints used to manage Positions within an Account.

get.description: List all Positions for an Account. The Positions returned are for every instrument that has had a position during the lifetime of an the Account.

RequestID.description: The unique identifier generated for the request

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: List all open Positions for an Account. An open Position is a Position in an Account that currently has a Trade opened for it.

200.description: The Account's open Positions are provided.

RequestID.description: The unique identifier generated for the request

positions.description: The list of open Positions in the Account.

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

get.description: Get the details of a single Instrument's Position in an Account. The Position may by open or not.

RequestID.description: The unique identifier generated for the request

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

put.description: Closeout the open Position for a specific instrument in an Account.

parameters.name: closePositionBody
parameters.description: Representation of how to close the position

longUnits.description: Indication of how much of the long Position to closeout. Either the string "ALL", the string "NONE", or a DecimalNumber representing how many units of the long position to close using a PositionCloseout MarketOrder. The units specified must always be positive.

shortUnits.description: Indication of how much of the short Position to closeout. Either the string "ALL", the string "NONE", or a DecimalNumber representing how many units of the short position to close using a PositionCloseout MarketOrder. The units specified must always be positive.

200.description: The Position closeout request has been successfully processed.

Location.description: A link to the Position that was just closed out

RequestID.description: The unique identifier generated for the request

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

items.description: The unique Transaction identifier within each Account.
items.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

400.description: The Parameters provided that describe the Position closeout are invalid.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request.

items.description: The unique Transaction identifier within each Account.
items.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

404.description: The Account or one or more of the Positions specified does not exist.

relatedTransactionIDs.description: The IDs of all Transactions that were created while satisfying the request. Only present if the Account exists.

items.description: The unique Transaction identifier within each Account.
items.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account. Only present if the Account exists.
lastTransactionID.format: String representation of the numerical OANDA-assigned TransactionID

errorCode.description: The code of the error that has occurred. This field may not be returned for some errors.

errorMessage.description: The human-readable description of the error that has occurred.

Position.description: The specification of a Position within an Account.

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

pl.description: Profit/loss realized by the Position over the lifetime of the Account.
pl.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

unrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of all open Trades that contribute to this Position.
unrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginUsed.description: Margin currently used by the Position.
marginUsed.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

resettablePL.description: Profit/loss realized by the Position since the Account's resettablePL was last reset by the client.
resettablePL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

financing.description: The total amount of financing paid/collected for this instrument over the lifetime of the Account.
financing.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

commission.description: The total amount of commission paid for this instrument over the lifetime of the Account.
commission.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

guaranteedExecutionFees.description: The total amount of fees charged over the lifetime of the Account for the execution of guaranteed Stop Loss Orders for this instrument.
guaranteedExecutionFees.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

PositionSide.description: The representation of a Position for a single direction (long or short).

units.description: Number of units in the position (negative value indicates short position, positive indicates long position).
units.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on what the number represents.

averagePrice.description: Volume-weighted average of the underlying Trade open prices for the Position.
averagePrice.format: A decimal number encodes as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Instrument.

tradeIDs.description: List of the open Trade IDs which contribute to the open Position.

items.description: The Trade's identifier, unique within the Trade's Account.
items.format: The string representation of the OANDA-assigned TradeID. OANDA-assigned TradeIDs are positive integers, and are derived from the TransactionID of the Transaction that opened the Trade.

pl.description: Profit/loss realized by the PositionSide over the lifetime of the Account.
pl.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

unrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of all open Trades that contribute to this PositionSide.
unrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

resettablePL.description: Profit/loss realized by the PositionSide since the Account's resettablePL was last reset by the client.
resettablePL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

financing.description: The total amount of financing paid/collected for this PositionSide over the lifetime of the Account.
financing.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

guaranteedExecutionFees.description: The total amount of fees charged over the lifetime of the Account for the execution of guaranteed Stop Loss Orders attached to Trades for this PositionSide.
guaranteedExecutionFees.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

CalculatedPositionState.description: The dynamic (calculated) state of a Position

instrument.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".

netUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

longUnrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of the Position's long open Trades
longUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

shortUnrealizedPL.description: The unrealized profit/loss of the Position's short open Trades
shortUnrealizedPL.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

marginUsed.description: Margin currently used by the Position.
marginUsed.format: A decimal number encoded as a string. The amount of precision provided depends on the Account's home currency.

instrumentNamePathParam.name: instrument
instrumentNamePathParam.format: A string containing the base currency and quote currency delimited by a "_".
